result.markdown:
---
title: "That's my type (Complete)"
---



In the following exercises, first guess what type the vector will be coerced to, then check your intuition with the `typeof()` function.

1.  `c(1, 1L, "C")`



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
c(1, 1L, "C")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] "1" "1" "C"
```


:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
1
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] 1
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
1L
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] 1
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
"C"
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] "C"
```


:::
:::



Guess: \_\_\_



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
typeof(c(1, 1L, "C"))
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] "character"
```


:::
:::



2.  `c(1L / 0, "A")`



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
c(1L / 0, "A")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] "Inf" "A"  
```


:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
typeof(1L)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] "integer"
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
typeof(0)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] "double"
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
typeof(1L/0)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] "double"
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
typeof("A")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] "character"
```


:::
:::



Guess: \_\_\_



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
typeof(c(1L / 0, "A"))
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] "character"
```


:::
:::



3.  `c(1:3, 5)`



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
c(1:3, 5)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] 1 2 3 5
```


:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
typeof(1:3)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] "integer"
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
typeof(5)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] "double"
```


:::
:::



Guess: \_\_\_



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
typeof(c(1:3, 5))
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] "double"
```


:::
:::



4.  `c(3, "3+")`



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
c(3, "3+")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] "3"  "3+"
```


:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
typeof(3)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] "double"
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
typeof("3+")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] "character"
```


:::
:::



Guess: \_\_\_



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
typeof(c(3, "3+"))
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] "character"
```


:::
:::



5.  `c(NA, TRUE)`



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
c(NA, TRUE)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1]   NA TRUE
```


:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
typeof(NA)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] "logical"
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
typeof(TRUE)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] "logical"
```


:::
:::



Guess: \_\_\_



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
typeof(c(NA, TRUE))
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] "logical"
```


:::
:::
